level.heading: Scope of practice for real estate appraisers.
level.text: For the purposes of this part, the term "real estate appraiser" means any person who renders or offers to render professional services to persons, groups, or organizations in the act or process of estimating the value of real property and real estate.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 16-130 substituted "value of real property and real estate" for "value of real estate".

level.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
level.text: Section 2(j) of D.C. Law 16-101 substituted "real property and real estate" for "real estate".
Section 4(b) of D.C. Law 16-101 provided that the act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2(j) of Non-Health Related Occupations and Professions Licensure Emergency Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-255, January 26, 2006, 53 DCR 763).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-261
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2801.
